title: 怎么用rpgitem弄召唤神奇宝贝的东西
author: 宇哥大大

replies.author: 长安_
replies.txt_content:
只需给rpgitem物品添加绑定一个指令即可
例如:
/rpgitem [物品] power command rightclick 0 使用成功 `poke give {player} [宝可梦名字]` * 1

replies.author: 宇哥大大
replies.txt_content:
